arts.ttl: Real Madrid's Eduardo Camavinga Did Something He Hasn't Done Before in the Game vs FC Kairat
arts.sum: Real Madrid scored four second-half goals in the 5-0 win over FC Kairat in Matchday 2 of the Champions League. Eduardo Camavinga Scores First Ever Champions League Goal

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappé hails ‘amazing’ Real Madrid teammate after Kairat clash
arts.sum: Real Madrid star Kylian Mbappé has on Tuesday lavished fresh praise on a fellow member of Xabi Alonso’s squad. The player in question? Arda Güler. This comes fresh off Arda…

arts.ttl: Champions League roundup: Mbappé hat-trick leads Real Madrid rout of Kairat
arts.sum: Real bounce back from derby defeat with 5-0 away win Atalanta fight back to beat Club Brugge 2-1 at home Kylian Mbappé scored a hat-trick as Real Madrid eased to a 5-0 away win over Champions League debutants Kairat Almaty on Tuesday. Xabi Alonso’s side bounced back from Saturday’s humbling 5-2 La Liga loss to Atlético Madrid in style, with Mbappé taking his Champions League tally to five goals in two European games this season. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Post-Match Press Conference Following Real Madrid’s UCL Win Over FC Kairat
arts.sum: They didn't have it all their own way, but Real Madrid did manage a 5-0 win over Kazakhstan side FC Kairat in the league phase of the Champions League. Xabi Alonso spoke to the media after the Champions League win in Kazakhstan.

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso speaks on claims of Vinícius Jr’s anger with substitution vs Kairat
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Xabi Alonso has responded to claims that attacking star Vinícius Jr. was left frustrated with his substitution during the club’s latest outing. Real Madrid were of…

arts.ttl: FC Kairat 0-5 Real Madrid: Report & Full Match Highlights as Mbappé Adds Hat-trick
arts.sum: Goals from Brahim Diaz and Eduardo Camavinga, while Kylian Mbappé continued his exceptional run of form with a hat-trick, leading Xabi Alonso's side to victory. The first opportunity of the game came from the hosts on the first ball of the match after less than a minute of play, but Courtois easily saved Dastan Satpaev's header.

arts.ttl: Bizarre Thibaut Courtois vs Pedri stat surfaces after Real Madrid’s win over Kairat
arts.sum: A head-turning statistic comparing the creative efforts of Real Madrid goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois with those of Barcelona midfielder Pedri has come to the fore on Tuesday evening. This comes owing…

arts.ttl: Mbappe's majestic night: Real star hat-trick seals dominant win against Kairat
arts.sum: Real Madrid win their second game of the 2025-26 Champions League season, beating Kairat 5-0 at Ortalyq stadion on Tuesday evening.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappe Hits Champions League Milestone After Netting Hat-Trick vs FC Kairat
arts.sum: Real Madrid forward Kylian Mbappe continued his hot start to the season, scoring a hat-trick in the side's Champions League win over FC Kairat. It was his second in the Champions League for Mbappe, who had scored his first against Manchester City in the playoff of last season's competition.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid star sends message to Xabi Alonso with starring cameo off bench vs Kairat
arts.sum: A member of the attacking ranks at La Liga giants Real Madrid sent a clear message to manager Xabi Alonso by way of his performance in the club’s latest outing.…
